snippet.title: The Talos Principle: Reawakened | Become a Creator | Coming April 10 | Demo Available Now
snippet.description:
Play the demo now and start creating with the fully operational level editor: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3398520/The_Talos_Principle_Reawakened_Demo/

The Talos Principle: Reawakened is launching on April 10. To make the wait easier, the game's demo version is available right now for your enjoyment.

This demo gives you a sweet taste of what awaits you in the full game and gives you a glimpse of the world Croteam rebuilt. More importantly, the demo features the fully featured Puzzle Editor, allowing you to create complete episodes with any number of levels.

Play it now on Steam!
__

Visit our website for more info: https://www.devolverdigital.com/

Subscribe for more: https://devolver.link/youtube

Follow Devolver Digital
X/Twitter:  https://twitter.com/devolverdigital
Facebook:   https://www.facebook.com/DevolverDigital/
Instagram:   https://www.instagram.com/devolverdigital/
TikTok:   https://www.tiktok.com/@devolverdigital

#indiegames #devolver #digital
